data.title: A Site Rafters Salvo + Drone Execute
data.description: Execute the A Site with this combination of utility, Defenders will have an extremely tough time holding backsite with your Salvo to force them out.

data.title: A Site + Rafters Armageddon Clear
data.description: Force Defenders to give up site or take an unfavorable, aggressive fight towards A Site.

data.title: Kitchen + B Site Armageddon Clear
data.description: Force Defenders to give up site or take an unfavorable, aggressive fight towards B Site.

data.title: B Site Salvo Exec + Yellow Drone Clear
data.description: Set your team up successfully when executing the B Site with this simple, but effective combination of utility.
